text: Werewolf by Night is an American TV special directed by Michael Giacchino and written by Heather Quinn and Peter Cameron. It is based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name. Produced by Marvel Studios the special is the first Marvel Studios Special Presentation of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). It stars Gael García Bernal. Werewolf by Night was released on October 7, 2022 on Disney+. It got positive reviews. == Cast and characters == * Gael García Bernal as Jack Russell / Werewolf by Night * Laura Donnelly as Elsa Bloodstone * Harriet Sansom Harris as Verussa Bloodstone == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2022 movies Category:American television movies Category:Disney+ movies Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino Category:Marvel Studios Special Presentations
title: Werewolf by Night (TV special)
